description: Scallops are the perfect quick-cook protein for a speedy stir fry.
name: Sweet Chilli Scallop Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large non stick pan or wok and cook the garlic and ginger for 2 minutes. Add the scallops and cook for 1 minute on high heat. Remove from the wok with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add a drizzle of oil into the pan and cook the broccoli and spring onion for 3-4 minutes, stir in the kale and cook for 2 minutes until wilted, adding a little water as necessary.
Pour over the sweet chilli sauce and add the scallops back into the wok and cook for 1 minute. Top with fresh coriander and a squeeze of lime and serve.
